thread.title: Exes Emma Stone and Andrew Garfield Share a Sweet Hug Ahead of the BAFTAs
thread.title_full: Exes Emma Stone and Andrew Garfield Share a Sweet Hug Ahead of the BAFTAs

author: Kelsie Gibson
title: Exes Emma Stone and Andrew Garfield Share a Sweet Hug Ahead of the BAFTAs
text:
Emma Stone and Andrew Garfield at Pre-BAFTAs Party Feb. 2017 Exes Emma Stone and Andrew Garfield Share a Sweet Hug Ahead of the BAFTAs February 12, 2017 by Kelsie Gibson 164 Shares 
Be still our hearts, Emma Stone and Andrew Garfield have reunited again . On Saturday night, the former couple shared a sweet embrace when they attended the pre-2017 BAFTAs Nespresso Nominees' Party in London. While the La La Land star's face is hidden in the picture, the Hacksaw Ridge actor just couldn't hide his big smile as he leaned in for a hug. Of course, this isn't the first time the two have made us swoon this award season . They also had a cute interaction when they attended the annual AFI Awards luncheon . Seeing that they're up for best actor and best actress , we really hope we'll get another reunion at the Oscars. Related:
